page.title: 17The Naafi Warehouse
page.content: The Naafi Warehouse is the largest civilian building and apart from the Armed Forces, the major employer in the area.The Naafi has no shareholders.It is controlled by a Council appointed by the Service Boards.As well as supplying Service units and Messes it stocks the many shops in Wales and the West.Its computer handles Â£10,000 of stock each day.From the Naafi you can buy anything from a tin of beans to a video at the same price as in a supermarket. Three hundred people are employed,36 on computers,45 on transport,20 in the tea factory which blends tea from all over the world and the rest on the warehouse floor. The Naafi is an excellent employer providing a subsidised canteen,bar and club for its employees.
